entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:09 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -25.5°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
